div.p: A.B.M.L.A.T. and E.L.A. conceived the idea of the paper. U.L.F., J.X.L.N. and A.B.M.L.A.T. contributed to the acquisition and analysis of the available data. J.X.L.N. and U.L.F. carried out the computer simulations. E.L.A. and J.X.L.N. discussed the numerical results. E.L.A., A.B.M.L.A.T. and J.X.L.N. prepared the draft. E.L.A. and U.L.F. coordinated the project, and handled the financial support. All authors critically revised the manuscript and gave final approval of the version to be published.
